entry.title: Albion College Cruises the Potomac
entry.summary:
Join fellow Briton Kristen Neller Verderame, ‘90, and other DC area Albion College alumni, parents, and friends for an unforgettable Sunset Cruise of the Potomac River on the Boomerang Party Yacht. Why do the same old happy hour/alumni networking event when you can cruise in style and enjoy the monuments during the day, and again as they light up at night? College staff will be on hand to share the evening with you and fill you in on the latest news from campus. Whether you’re looking for a relaxing evening on the water or want to start the night off right, this sunset cruise is the perfect thing for you. Thursday, July 24 at 7:30 p.m.(Please arrive 10-20 minutes prior to departure)Departure Location: Georgetown Water Front3100 K St. NW DC, 20007
Cost: $25.00/person($5 of the ticket price is a tax-deductible donation to Albion College for which you will receive a mailed receipt)  All attendees must be 21+ years of ageSpace is limited so please reserve your spot by Friday, July 11 Visit the Boomerang Yacht Sunset Cruise website for additional cruise information.
To make a reservation, contact the Office of Alumni Engagement at 517/629-0448 or collegeevents@albion.edu.  Direct questions to Carly Wegner at 517/629-0768 or cwegner@albion.edu.

entry.title: Grand Slam Summer: Albion at Comerica Park
entry.summary: Enjoy a baseball game with family, friends, and Albion College! Soak in the sights and sounds of the ballpark with albion College alumni, parents, friends, and students. We look forward to this family-friendly tradition every year. Join us in Detroit on Tuesday, July 29 for to watch the Detroit Tigers play the Chicago White Sox at 7:08 p.m. The Albion College Detroit Alumni Chapter will host a family-friendly happy hour near the stadium before the first pitch is thrown. Tickets are available on a first-come, first-served basis. More information about games, registration, and ticket prices can be found online at www.albion.edu/alumni/grandslam. For additional information, contact the Office of Alumni Engagement at 517/629-0448 or collegeevents@albion.edu.
